pkgmetadata.longdescription: Java Executable .jar Files for 'RKEEL' // KEEL is a popular Java software for a large number of different knowledge data discovery tasks. Furthermore, 'RKEEL' is a package with a R code layer between R and KEEL, for using KEEL in R code. This package downloads and install the .jar files necessary for 'RKEEL' algorithms execution. For more information about KEEL, see http://www.keel.es/.
